New Records: Nikola Jokic achieved the first game of 20+p, 15+r, & 15+a in under 30 minutes in NBA history
Key Match Events: Denver Nuggets scored 40 points in the first quarter
Atlanta Hawks rallied from down nine early in the second to lead 62-57 before Denver responded
Jokic nearly had a triple-double at intermission with 13 points, 10 rebounds and nine assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaden Ivey sustained what appeared to be a serious leg injury in a collision with the Magic's Cole Anthony
Others: Denver Nuggets beat the Atlanta Hawks 139-120 in NBA
Russell Westbrook also hit 16 points and had 11 assists for the Nuggets
Trae Young led the Hawks with 30 points and nine assists
